markings: on bottom, on sticker: [Andrew Kahane Ltd./ Oriental Art/ New York/ 501]
medium:
Jun ware
Stoneware with blue glaze and purple markings
text: Jun ware of the Song dynasty (960-1279) are usually recognizable by their blue or purple glazes and seemingly random “splashes” of color, although these designs were usually applied with deliberation. The final effect is reminiscent of an abstract painting.
title: Saucer bowl
